text: Check TV for Queen of Sauce & weather
Pet every animal in coops & barns
Collect and refill animal produce
Water crops that aren’t under sprinklers
Harvest ready greenhouse crops
Refill kegs / preserve jars / casks
Collect from crab pots and re-bait
Empty crystalariums and re-load
Gather truffles with the pig(s)
Check fish-ponds for requests / items
Tap trees and collect syrup/oil/resin
Smelt ore in furnaces
Check cellar for finished cask items
Gift a villager their loved item
Check the bulletin board for new quests
Visit the Traveling Cart if it’s Friday/Sunday
Mine 5–10 floors or hit Skull Cavern
Forage seasonal items on the map
Fish until daily luck timer ends
Replenish hay in feeding benches if low
Collect and ship high-value goods
Check mushroom cave / fruit cave
Water and harvest garden pots
Pick up litter / recycling from crab pots
Check birthday list and gift accordingly
Re-stock bait on all fishing rods
Collect daily output from Statue of Perfection
Till and plant new crops for upcoming season
Check Desert Trader / Island Trader stock
End-of-month: harvest flowers & non-regrowth crops
